casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeremy Dushane MURRELL. No. 484A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 27, 2007. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, Paul Green, Durham, for Jeremy Dushane Murrell. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of September 2007 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Response to Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 26th day of November 2007 to file and serve his/her response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of September 2007."
